channel.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
channel.description:
When I logged in this morning, I had this glitch... couldn't move or anything... just talk...
But then I lagged after couple of minutes, then got back to normal.. :D
[img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/5088/coolglitch.png[/img]

item.source: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me

item.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:21, topic:346833”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=443212.msg3254540#msg3254540 date=1278016882]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443212.msg3254532#msg3254532 date=1278016614]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=443212.msg3254528#msg3254528 date=1278016418]

c00l m@n. thats sh0 interesting.

… this happens a lot lol runescapes shit…

Because of lagging, RuneScape is lagging these years
[/quote]cuz its encumbered wif gayness

How is that?

[/quote]it just changed too much from when it was actual fun. like the hitpoint system just bothers me, it was pointless to do. the levels being max 120 is retarded, another pointless downdate, trade limits, pking gone, grand exchange took away merching, its a lot harder too now. and honestly my motivation to play it without just fucking with people is gone…

The 120 as max level is because of private servers, and then people requesting it. As for the grand exchange, its good, with 1 point, but it blocks you from making decient cash. But it does help you sell/buy stuff if you don’t have much time to play each day.
[/quote]grand exchange made the economy so stuck though. it just gets old. it used to be kind of realistic how it was kinda up and down. and the max level 120 is still retarded… no matter what

The reason is why runescape lagging is…

1- ALL servers when you put max state up to 99, like make max state to 110… Server will lag when some 1 get 110…

2- So RuneScape made the dungeneering state to 120, But RuneScape didn’t start to lagg when dungeneering came up, it started to lagg when some 1 got his dungeneering state up to 99…

I relazied that when I first lagged, went to see highscores, saw some 1 got dungeneering up to 99…

You don’t know what you are talking about.[/quote]

No, I do… then TELL ME WHY IS RUNESCAPE LAGGING???

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me

item.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:11, topic:346833”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443212.msg3254532#msg3254532 date=1278016614]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443212.msg3254515#msg3254515 date=1278015889]

c00l m@n. thats sh0 interesting.

… this happens a lot lol runescapes shit…

Because of lagging, RuneScape is lagging these years
[/quote]cuz its encumbered wif gayness

How is that?

[/quote]it just changed too much from when it was actual fun. like the hitpoint system just bothers me, it was pointless to do. the levels being max 120 is retarded, another pointless downdate, trade limits, pking gone, grand exchange took away merching, its a lot harder too now. and honestly my motivation to play it without just fucking with people is gone…

The 120 as max level is because of private servers, and then people requesting it. As for the grand exchange, its good, with 1 point, but it blocks you from making decient cash. But it does help you sell/buy stuff if you don’t have much time to play each day.
[/quote]grand exchange made the economy so stuck though. it just gets old. it used to be kind of realistic how it was kinda up and down. and the max level 120 is still retarded… no matter what

The reason is why runescape lagging is…

1- ALL servers when you put max state up to 99, like make max state to 110… Server will lag when some 1 get 110…

2- So RuneScape made the dungeneering state to 120, But RuneScape didn’t start to lagg when dungeneering came up, it started to lagg when some 1 got his dungeneering state up to 99…

I relazied that when I first lagged, went to see highscores, saw some 1 got dungeneering up to 99…[/quote]

You don’t know what you are talking about.

[/quote]

item.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:16, topic:346833”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=443212.msg3254586#msg3254586 date=1278018991]
It is true 100%…

But if it’s not, then tell me why is RuneScape lagging?
[/quote]

Not because someone is leveling a skill, lol.

I don’t know about you but I rarely lag, and when I do, it’s my own fault by opening too many tabs on my browser or something. The only lag I experience in some world servers is this 1-5 second lag, in which nothing happens and the game will resume itself after the lag.[/quote]

Hmm… Happy birthday

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me

item.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:15, topic:346833”]It is true 100%…

But if it’s not, then tell me why is RuneScape lagging?[/quote]

Not because someone is leveling a skill, lol.

I don’t know about you but I rarely lag, and when I do, it’s my own fault by opening too many tabs on my browser or something. The only lag I experience in some world servers is this 1-5 second lag, in which nothing happens and the game will resume itself after the lag.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me

item.title: RuneScape wierdest glitch... Happened to me
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:14, topic:346833”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=443212.msg3254548#msg3254548 date=1278017212]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443212.msg3254543#msg3254543 date=1278016944]

[quote author=spy man47 link=topic=443212.msg3254540#msg3254540 date=1278016882]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443212.msg3254532#msg3254532 date=1278016614]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=443212.msg3254528#msg3254528 date=1278016418]

c00l m@n. thats sh0 interesting.

… this happens a lot lol runescapes shit…

Because of lagging, RuneScape is lagging these years
[/quote]cuz its encumbered wif gayness

How is that?

[/quote]it just changed too much from when it was actual fun. like the hitpoint system just bothers me, it was pointless to do. the levels being max 120 is retarded, another pointless downdate, trade limits, pking gone, grand exchange took away merching, its a lot harder too now. and honestly my motivation to play it without just fucking with people is gone…

The 120 as max level is because of private servers, and then people requesting it. As for the grand exchange, its good, with 1 point, but it blocks you from making decient cash. But it does help you sell/buy stuff if you don’t have much time to play each day.
[/quote]grand exchange made the economy so stuck though. it just gets old. it used to be kind of realistic how it was kinda up and down. and the max level 120 is still retarded… no matter what

The reason is why runescape lagging is…

1- ALL servers when you put max state up to 99, like make max state to 110… Server will lag when some 1 get 110…

2- So RuneScape made the dungeneering state to 120, But RuneScape didn’t start to lagg when dungeneering came up, it started to lagg when some 1 got his dungeneering state up to 99…

I relazied that when I first lagged, went to see highscores, saw some 1 got dungeneering up to 99…
[/quote]ur kidding right… lolol how would someones level in a skill cause lag?

It happaned to me severel times, when I tried to put in my server the max skill to 110…

Why don’t you try it?
[/quote]Lol’d. But if this is true then… lul.[/quote]

It is true 100%…

But if it’s not, then tell me why is RuneScape lagging?

Read full topic

How is that?

[/quote]it just changed too much from when it was actual fun. like the hitpoint system just bothers me, it was pointless to do. the levels being max 120 is retarded, another pointless downdate, trade limits, pking gone, grand exchange took away merching, its a lot harder too now. and honestly my motivation to play it without just fucking with people is gone…

The 120 as max level is because of private servers, and then people requesting it. As for the grand exchange, its good, with 1 point, but it blocks you from making decient cash. But it does help you sell/buy stuff if you don’t have much time to play each day.
[/quote]grand exchange made the economy so stuck though. it just gets old. it used to be kind of realistic how it was kinda up and down. and the max level 120 is still retarded… no matter what

The reason is why runescape lagging is…

1- ALL servers when you put max state up to 99, like make max state to 110… Server will lag when some 1 get 110…

2- So RuneScape made the dungeneering state to 120, But RuneScape didn’t start to lagg when dungeneering came up, it started to lagg when some 1 got his dungeneering state up to 99…

I relazied that when I first lagged, went to see highscores, saw some 1 got dungeneering up to 99…
[/quote]ur kidding right… lolol how would someones level in a skill cause lag?

It happaned to me severel times, when I tried to put in my server the max skill to 110…

Why don’t you try it?[/quote]Lol’d. But if this is true then… lul.
